description: Covers material from first three weeks of course. Includes statistical inference principles, finite-sample/asymptotic efficiency concepts, and parameter estimation/hypothesis testing.
50-minute test assessing knowledge from weeks 1-5. Includes problem solving questions on statistical inference principles, efficiency concepts, parameter estimation, and nonparametric methods.
Covers material from weeks 4-8. Focuses on parameter estimation, nonparametric methods, and R programming for bootstrapping/robust estimation.

2 hour 10 minute comprehensive exam covering all course content. Includes short numerical/answer questions on statistical inference principles, efficiency concepts, parameter estimation, nonparametric methods, and R applications.
